name: The Technomagical Method
description:
If you experience lag or stuttering, download the version for your system, below.

All of these "alchemists" and "sorcerors" running around with their haphazard, chaotic "experiments".

You are not like them. You are a scientist!

So dust off your alchemical tablet, gather your lizard skulls, your fire salts, your lab gnomes and your cheese and crack the secrets of alchemy once and for all!

The Technomagical Method is a tough puzzle game about the scientific method. Every ritual has secret rules that you must gradually crack with inductive logic: "Why does this work and not that? What do these patterns have in common".

With a tutorial, tips, and greedy gnome helpers, you might, MIGHT be able to untangle the rules of magic.

Submitted for the Miz Jam 1.0, devlog coming soon!
